response.overview: Kalafina 9+ONE at Tokyo International Forum Hall A  Kalafina  Release Date: November 1, 2017  Product Details  Catalog No.: VVXL-16  JAN/ISBN: 547366328691  Product Type: Blu-ray  TV Standard: NTSC  Number of Discs: 1  Label/Distributor: SACRA MUSIC  Region: free  Subtitles: none  Description  Release of Kalafina live held at Tokyo International Forum celebrating 10 years career anniversary.
